function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation in built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, air filtration, and air circulation","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, and ventilation control systems","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"},{"Description":"Overcrowding in public spaces","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread","Mitigation":"Limiting occupancy, staggered schedules, and social distancing measures","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, crowd management technologies","People":"Public and private space users","Owner":"Government authorities, facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of sanitation and hygiene practices","Impact":"Increased risk of infection transmission","Mitigation":"Promoting hand hygiene, cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Touchless fixtures, UV-C sanitization systems","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"}]}
